snippet: The McDonald’s report provided some positive news to balance concern over the announcement that Italy’s prime minister would resign.
abstract: Stocks edge higher after strong McDonald’s sales report provides some positive news to balance concern over the announcement that Italy’s prime minister would resign.
lead_paragraph: The McDonald’s report provided some positive news to balance concern over the announcement that Italy’s prime minister would resign.

headline.main: McDonald’s Sales Help Shares Inch Higher
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Sales Help Shares Inch Higher
